hedline.hl1: Livery Driver Is Killed By Passenger in Brooklyn

abstract.p: 47-year-old livery driver Luis Melendez is shot and killed in Brooklyn when teen-ager tries to avoid paying fare (S)

block.p: A livery driver was shot and killed last night in Brooklyn, when a teen-ager tried to avoid paying a fare, the police said.
Luis Melendez, 47, was shot three times in the torso. Witnesses told the police the attacker was about 16 years old.
A livery driver was shot and killed last night in Brooklyn, when a teen-ager tried to avoid paying a fare, the police said.
Luis Melendez, 47, was shot three times in the torso. Witnesses told the police the attacker was about 16 years old.
The incident occurred around 4 P.M. at the corner of Newkirk and Rogers Avenues in the East Flatbush section, said Officer Carmen Melendez, a police spokeswoman who is not related to the victim.
The suspect fled on foot, and Mr. Melendez was left with $2,000 in his pocket, Officer Melendez said.
Mr. Melendez was taken to Kings County Hospital, where he underwent surgery. He died at 8 P.M.
